content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One of problems during SVN commit failure can be resolved by Help Desk. Please review information provided at KB about special SVN commit hook: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(0, 0, 0)\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"font-size\":\"medium\",\"font-style\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-ligatures\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-caps\":\"normal\",\"font-weight\":\"400\",\"letter-spacing\":\"normal\",\"orphans\":\"2\",\"text-align\":\"start\",\"text-indent\":\"0px\",\"text-transform\":\"none\",\"white-space\":\"normal\",\"widows\":\"2\",\"word-spacing\":\"0px\",\"-webkit-text-stroke-width\":\"0px\",\"text-decoration-style\":\"initial\",\"text-decoration-color\":\"initial\",\"display\":\"inline !important\",\"float\":\"none\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Hook%20installation%20step%20while%20using%20Tortoise%20SVN%20Client.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". So, if it clear from request description that commit failed because user did not provide comment, which is at least 3 words long, provide appropriate clarifications to him. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(0, 0, 0)\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"font-size\":\"medium\",\"font-style\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-ligatures\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-caps\":\"normal\",\"font-weight\":\"400\",\"letter-spacing\":\"normal\",\"orphans\":\"2\",\"text-align\":\"start\",\"text-indent\":\"0px\",\"text-transform\":\"none\",\"white-space\":\"normal\",\"widows\":\"2\",\"word-spacing\":\"0px\",\"-webkit-text-stroke-width\":\"0px\",\"text-decoration-style\":\"initial\",\"text-decoration-color\":\"initial\",\"display\":\"inline !important\",\"float\":\"none\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
